user_input:
Please create hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. 
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input. Do not interact with or query any PLEXOS database; use functions to generate and export files.

tasks.description: Generate hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050, with nodes split as requested. Do not access any PLEXOS database.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', determine the scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE), years (2030, 2035, 2040, 2050), and apply node-splitting rules. Produce hourly Hydrogen demand profiles as intermediate files suitable for TST export without querying any PLEXOS database.

function_args.user_input: Create hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Split nodes as requested. Do not access any PLEXOS database. Prepare outputs for subsequent TST workbook export.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly Hydrogen demand profiles to TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Consume the outputs produced by 'main_demand_processer_v2' to build TST-formatted workbooks for scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE and years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050. Do not access any PLEXOS database.
